item.title: PbrMYB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr028812.1 Gene Symbol: PbrMYB21 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus betulaefolia Functional Descriptions: PbrMYB21, a novel MYB protein of Pyrus betulaefolia, functions in drought tolerance and modulates polyamine levels by regulating arginine decarboxylase gene.

item.title: PbrWRKY53
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr018725.1 Gene Symbol: PbrWRKY53 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 53 Genome: Species: Pyrus betulaefolia Functional Descriptions: A WRKY transcription factor PbrWRKY53 from Pyrus betulaefolia is involved in drought tolerance and AsA accumulation.
